issue.title: [Java] C data interface: Reading as nioBuffer from imported buffer causes error
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16674](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16674). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Get following exception when reading nio buffer derived from the imported buffer:

java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
	at java.nio.Buffer.checkIndex(Buffer.java:551)
	at java.nio.DirectByteBuffer.getInt(DirectByteBuffer.java:684)
